autobiography.introduction: Hello! I'm MegaBarto, a passionate Systems and Computer Engineer with a love for technology and innovation.
autobiography.background: With years of experience in software development, I specialize in creating efficient solutions and exploring cutting-edge technologies.
autobiography.current: Currently, I'm focused on web development, cloud computing, and sharing knowledge through my blog and projects.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and TypeScript, featuring internationalization and modern design patterns.

project2.title: Web Application
project2.description: A full-stack web application with user authentication, real-time features, and modern architecture.

project3.title: API Service
project3.description: A robust REST API service with comprehensive documentation and scalable architecture.

info.title: Let's Connect!
info.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or just having a chat about technology. Feel free to reach out!
